title.text: A Statistical Profile of the Named Entity Task

abstractContent.text: In this paper we present a statistical profile of the Named Entity task, a specific information extraction task for which corpora in several languages are available.

Using the results of the statistical analysis , we propose an algorithm for lower bound estimation for Named Entity corpora and discuss the significance of the cross-lingual comparisons provided by the analysis.
